https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ohh1tVPHLXQNrWjc7ReMSNgSFp9.jpg In a rain swept Tokyo, Eko complicates her life by publishing a 'Call For Dreams' ad in a newspaper. As strangers leave descriptions of dreams on her answering machine, a parallel police investigation of a murder in Tel Aviv unfolds. Call for Dreams
